DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Subjects With Mild-to-Moderate Alzheimer 's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 2 study design evaluate efficacy safety ABT-126 approximately 260 adult mild-to-moderate Alzheimer 's disease ( AD ) . Subjects randomized one four treatment group ( ABT-126 , donepezil , placebo ) 12-week Treatment Period . Acronyms list secondary outcome section , , find list acronym define : - MMSE - Mini Mental Status Exam - QoL-AD - Quality Life - Alzheimer 's Disease - CIBIC-plus - Clinician Interview-Based Impression Change - NPI - Neuropsychiatric Inventory - CSDD - The Cornell Scale depression Dementia - ADCS-ADL - Alzheimer 's Disease Cooperative Study - Activities Daily Living
DOC.criteria: The subject male female age 55 90 year , inclusive , Screening Visit 1 . The subject meet NINCDS/ADRDA criterion probable AD . The subject MiniMental Status Examination ( MMSE ) total score 10 24 , inclusive , Screening Visit 1 . The subject Modified Hachinski Ischemic Scale ( MHIS ) score less equal 4 Screening Visit 1 . If female , subject must postmenopausal least two year surgically sterile The subject identify , reliable , caregiver . The subject currently take take medication treatment Alzheimer 's disease dementia within 60 day prior Screening Visit 1 The subject history significant neurologic disease AD . In opinion investigator , subject clinically significant uncontrolled medical psychiatric illness . The subject report history discontinuation donepezil due lack efficacy . The subject history intolerance adverse reaction donepezil lead discontinuation . The subject know hypersensitivity donepezil , piperidine derivative , excipients either donepezil hydrochloride ABT126 formulation . Patient us nonprescribed drug abuse history drug alcohol abuse/dependence . Subjects AST ALT value Screening Visit 1 great equal 1.5fold upper limit normal ( ULN ) .
